channel.title: Certain Includes Not in Package?
channel.description:
Everytime I try to run the flax script this is what scar says:
Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl\srl\core\AutoRespond.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl\srl\core\AntiRandoms.scar does not exist. Failed when compiling
I have downloaded a couple SRL folders but cant seem to find these.

item.title: Certain Includes Not in Package?
item.dc:creator: @ejjman1 ejjman1
item.description:
@ejjman1 wrote:

Go to DOWNLOAD SRL HERE, and follow the instructions to install it on your computer.

Read full topic
